channel.title: Pi trying to add doors, run.bat error?
channel.description:
./Data/cfg/global-objects.cfg: file not found. Starting up.. java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\Data\doors.txt (The system cannot find the fil specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at server.model.players.objects.Doors.processLineByLine(Doors.java:214) at server.model.players.objects.Doors.load(Doors.java:206) at server.Server.run(Server.java:91) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) at server.Server.main(Server.java:72) Loaded 0 doors in 4ms. May 06, 2012 2:10:41 PM server.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... May 06, 2012 2:10:41 PM server.RS2Server start INFO: Setting up login channels... May 06, 2012 2:10:41 PM server.RS2Server start INFO: Server is ready Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594 System resources cleaned
the guide said to put doors.txt into my data folder which i did, i compiled no errors, the run.bat gave errors :( and the doors still isn't working

item.title: Pi trying to add doors, run.bat error?

item.title: Pi trying to add doors, run.bat error?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Your data folder is probably different from his. Change the directory “.\Data” to wherever your data folder is.

Read full topic
